instruction: Analyze a given dataset and describe the insights from it.
input: Dataset: Weather Temperature variations over the past month
output: The weather temperature variations over the past month have been quite drastic. The average temperature has been around 28 Celsius and the maximum temperature observed has been 35 Celsius. There have been two dips in temperature over the past month including one at the beginning of the month where we observed a temperature of 24 Celsius and another one at the end of the month with the temperature dropping to 22 Celsius. We can say that the weather has been quite hot with the temperature gradually increasing up until the peak of 35 Celsius.
